projects.title: Hygieia - A HYBRID AI FRAMEWORK FOR MULTI DISEASE DIAGNOSIS
projects.description: A Framework has been built with multiple models to predict variety of conditions with scalable features and high trustworthy accuracy.
projects.longDescription: This Framework uses multiple AI models to diagnose. It has AI Chatting capabilities for the Healthcare and Blockchain integration. It integrates data from different sources to provide reliable health assessments.

projects.title: Predicting Microsoft Stock Values
projects.description: This project uses time series analysis and Keras to predict Microsoft stock values. The model was trained and evaluated, showing a Root Mean Squared Error (RMSE) of 16.94 (5.75% error) on data from 2020-2025.
projects.longDescription: A comprehensive stock prediction system using deep learning techniques including LSTM networks for time series forecasting. The project handles data preprocessing, time filtering, and timezone considerations.
